20110106190041.000|20110106190043.000|CC1|THE VICTIMS.

20110106190047.000|20110106190050.000|CC1|TWO DID SURVIVE, THEY ARE       
20110106190050.000|20110106190052.000|CC1|OUT OF SURGERY AND EXPECTED

20110106190648.000|20110106190650.000|CC1|PROPOFOL.

20110106190752.000|20110106190755.000|CC1|KENT: IT APPEARS THIS HOUR,     
20110106190755.000|20110106190759.000|CC1|FORMER OWRNG COUNTY CLASSIFY
